channel.title: love on Dave's Hacks
channel.description: Recent content in love on Dave's Hacks

item.title: LOVE paged list
item.description: So, the usual excuse for not posting here busy and all that…although I’ve been building quite a bit just forgot to upload any of it! Anyhow to the point, I’ve begun rewriting one of my early lua games using the LOVE game framework called CodeCopy. The original code is pretty rough, and so I’ve been rewriting to make use of objects and make most of it a lot more reusable. As well as adding level editor and some other nice features.
